data.eml:eml: Plectranthiasahiahiata, a new species of perchlet from a mesophotic ecosystem at Rapa Nui (Easter Island) (Teleostei, Serranidae, Anthiadinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shepherd, Bart, Phelps, Tyler, Pinheiro, Hudson T., Perez-Matus, Alejandro, Rocha, Luiz A. (2018): Plectranthiasahiahiata, a new species of perchlet from a mesophotic ecosystem at Rapa Nui (Easter Island) (Teleostei, Serranidae, Anthiadinae). ZooKeys 762: 105-116, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.762.24618, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.762.24618
